definition: action intended to nullify the effects of some previous action
details:
noun
- action intended to nullify the effects of some previous action
= synonyms: neutralisation, counteraction
- action intended to keep a country politically neutral or exclude it from a possible war
= example: action intended to keep a country politically neutral or exclude it from a possible war
= synonyms: neutralisation
- (euphemism) the removal of a threat by killing or destroying it (especially in a covert operation or military operation)
= synonyms: neutralisation
- a chemical reaction in which an acid and a base interact with the formation of a salt
= synonyms: neutralisation
